text:
I urge my fellow Floridians in #BrowardCounty to vote for @rpetty for School Board. No one has worked harder or will be a more effective advocate on the issue of school safety. I have seen firsthand his passion & drive. He was a driving force behind #StopSchoolViolenceAct https://twitter.com/orrinhatch/status/1027601578314747904 QT @OrrinHatch When tragedy struck in his community and he lost his sweet daughter Alaina, @rpetty jumped to action, helping me usher in the most meaningful school safety legislation in history.

I know him well, and I know students in Broward County will be in great hands with his leadership. http://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1027601328262897664/pu/img/8Mi-50If0s69Quhq.jpg https://video.twimg.com/ext_tw_video/1027601328262897664/pu/vid/320x180/Tu4TPTeMh2iTN3_t.mp4?tag=5

RT @chasejarvis Small daily action can change your life, and even the world. Truth bombs from Senator @CoryBooker http://www.chasejarvis.com/blog/why-creativity-is-the-key-to-leadership-w-sen-cory-booker/?utm_source=twitter&utm_medium=cj_social&utm_campaign=podcast http://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1027313887937478658/pu/img/tCrILW7LODT6kwIT.jpg https://video.twimg.com/ext_tw_video/1027313887937478658/pu/vid/240x240/v9Z5tikXymStRyHk.mp4?tag=5

Enjoyed my time in San Angelo yesterday visiting with members of the @usairforce at Goodfellow AFB. Looking forward to continuing my #TexasDefendsAmerica tour today in Abilene with a visit to Dyess Air Force Base! http://pbs.twimg.com/tweet_video_thumb/DkKV1ukXoAEG6L4.jpg https://video.twimg.com/tweet_video/DkKV1ukXoAEG6L4.mp4

There are fewer than 90 days to go until the midterms. Here’s what’s at stake in November:
→Health care
→The future for Dreamers
→Voting rights
→Women’s reproductive rights
→Climate change
→Common sense gun laws

We need to invest in our children, in our elderly, and in healthcare and education and environmental protection. People are sick and tired of spending billions and billions of dollars on nuclear weapons, war planes, missiles, bombs, and tanks.

Seeking asylum in the United States is legal, yet this Administration continues to turn its back on those who’ve faced unimaginable horrors. Shameful. 
https://www.vox.com/explainers/2018/8/6/17501404/trump-asylum-separate-legal-definition

RT @starsandstripes Texas Sen. Ted Cruz tells veterans that 'having the power to choose' can help fix their health care issues https://www.stripes.com/news/texas-sen-ted-cruz-tells-veterans-that-having-the-power-to-choose-can-help-fix-their-health-care-issues-1.541747

Ted Cruz came to San Angelo for a town hall. Here's what happened. https://www.gosanangelo.com/story/news/2018/08/08/live-ted-cruz-talks-veterans-issues-san-angelo-town-hall-meeting/940720002/ via @gosanangelo

I’m excited and honored to do 3 events across Vermont tomorrow with @AdyBarkan. Please join us tomorrow to stand up for health care, raising the minimum wage, paid family leave, racial justice, and our country! http://www.radvt.org/ady_hero

RT @NJIT NJIT was visited by @CoryBooker, @rasjbaraka, and @Altice CEO Dexter Goei to showcase the Ras Baraka Coding Insitute, along with  @RepDonaldPayne who hosted a business seminar! Read more: http://news.njit.edu/what-day-senator-mayor-and-congressman-visit-njit http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DkK648lU0AEUblB.jpg

Don't let this be swept under the rug: More than 1,400 people died in Puerto Rico, not 64 like the government claimed. This Administration needs to be held accountable for their neglect. 
https://twitter.com/AP/status/1027540959528202241 QT @AP BREAKING: Almost 11 months after Hurricane Maria, Puerto Rico concedes more than 1,400 people were killed by the storm last year -- not just the 64 in the official death toll. https://apnews.com/1fe6c144340d4d41963fd304d569c088/Puerto-Rico-concedes-Hurricane-Maria-deaths-more-than-1,400?utm_source=Twitter&utm_campaign=SocialFlow&utm_medium=AP

SATURDAY: I hope to see YOU in Cypress.

RSVP to join us now: https://www.eventbrite.com/e/ted-cruz-at-cypress-trail-hideout-in-cypress-tickets-48737574397 #TXSen #CruzCrew #KeepTexasRed http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DkLFHySXsAAz00n.jpg
Maybe, just maybe, we should make sure our people are not dying because they lack health insurance before we start spending billions to militarize outer space. #SpaceForce

Making a political revolution is not easy, and we should be enormously proud of the progress we are making across the country. @AbdulElSayed & @BrentWelder ran in what we knew from the start would be difficult races, and advanced the progressive cause in very significant ways.

Great to meet with local leaders in Abilene to discuss ways to continue working together on workplace initiatives to unleash economic growth & job opportunities for hardworking Texans. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DkLsn0LW0AArUnU.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DkLsp7yX4AcJWtF.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DkLsp7xW0AAp3Fy.jpg

Isata worked hard to provide for her family back in Sierra Leone. She was fired – supposedly for asking for tips – after trying to organize a union. The rich & powerful seize every chance to crush working Americans with no accountability, while people like Isata pay the price. https://twitter.com/thelilynews/status/1025595935525625856 QT @thelilynews As an immigrant, Isata Jalloh is one of the company’s most vulnerable workers. So why was she fired? https://www.thelily.com/a-mother-of-four-worked-at-dulles-airport-for-almost-20-years-she-was-fired-over-a-20-tip/

Later today I’ll tour an evacuation center in Lake County to meet with officials and evacuees affected by the Mendocino Complex Fire. California is resilient. I know that we will overcome this devastation and I’ll fight to ensure Californians get the relief they need.

We must recognize the collective power of the labor movement to demand and win respect and equity for workers across the country. When we stand together, we can win. https://www.nytimes.com/2018/08/08/opinion/missouri-labor-unions-vote.html

Tragically, the death toll in Puerto Rico from Hurricane Maria is far higher than the official count. The federal gov't hasn't done enough to assist or force accountability. I’ve called for a bipartisan commission to investigate the Trump Admin’s response. https://www.bostonglobe.com/opinion/editorials/2018/06/23/why-was-federal-response-puerto-rico-flawed/MEqMAITwMh22p0E3Jx6YRO/story.html https://twitter.com/AP/status/1027540959528202241 QT @AP BREAKING: Almost 11 months after Hurricane Maria, Puerto Rico concedes more than 1,400 people were killed by the storm last year -- not just the 64 in the official death toll. https://apnews.com/1fe6c144340d4d41963fd304d569c088/Puerto-Rico-concedes-Hurricane-Maria-deaths-more-than-1,400?utm_source=Twitter&utm_campaign=SocialFlow&utm_medium=AP

The Trump administration continues to lead a rapid shift towards oligarchy. We must have the courage to stand up and take on the powerful who only ever want more and more for themselves like Wilbur Ross. https://www.businessinsider.com/wilbur-ross-120-million-grift-allegations-in-bombshell-forbes-report-2018-8

A huge win! A federal court just ordered the @EPA to ban the toxic pesticide chlorpyrifos which has been linked to learning disabilities in children. After Pruitt reversed plans to ban it in 2017, we've pushed hard for its ban including legislation. https://www.huffingtonpost.com/entry/epa-ban-pesticide-chlorpyrifos_us_5b6c6d0ce4b0ae32af96318e
I also want to congratulate @JamesThompsonKS, Wesley Bell in Missouri, and @RashidaTlaib in Michigan. Their victories are important milestones for this nation. The struggle continues.

Just a reminder that this Administration was told if they separated immigrant children from their parents, it would cause significant and lasting harm. 

They did it anyway.

RT @ConcernedVets Thank you @SenTedCruz for joining us yesterday in San Angelo, Texas for a discussion on important #veterans issues. Watch the full discussion on our Facebook page: https://www.facebook.com/ConcernedVetsforAmerica/videos/1700570273398423/?linkId=55346833 http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DkKpuSaXcAA_kCn.jpg

#ThrowbackThursday to when Republican Congressman Chris Collins revealed the GOP's real motive about the #GOPTaxScam for the rich. 

It's time to clean up the rampant culture of corruption and self-enrichment among Republicans in Washington. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DkK4cuRUYAAi-uv.jpg

RT @Hicks_JustinM Oh and in case ya didn’t read it already in @gosanangelo , Sen. Cruz was also at @17TRW_GAFB today. The real news: In a press event, he said they still have not received formal orders to build a camp for immigrant detainees. https://twitter.com/sentedcruz/status/1027300839851880449 QT @SenTedCruz Today, I visited with Airmen & leaders at @17TRW_GAFB. They are busy training service members to be experts in the critical field of intelligence, survelliance & reconnaissance. I am proud of their contributions to the defense of our country. #TexasDefendsAmerica http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DkG0HNLX4AgmQfd.jpg

Had a great time visiting with members of the @usairforce at Dyess Air Force Base today! During my visit, I was briefed on Dyess AFB operations, the B-1 bomber force, C-130J airlift operations & the preparations being made for the new B-21 bomber. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DkMQs7cUwAEZeB6.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DkMQs6gU0AA2Kek.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DkMQs6hVAAAgcRI.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DkMQs7cVsAATcGO.jpg

The U.S. has a president who is so "tough" that he can order tiny kids to be torn from their parents' arms. Unfortunately, he's not so tough that he can speak out on human rights abuses in Saudi Arabia. Wouldn't it be nice if we had a leader who sounded more like @JustinTrudeau. https://twitter.com/NPR/status/1027542512074874881 QT @NPR "Canada will always speak strongly and clearly in private and public on questions of human rights," Prime Minister Justin Trudeau said amid a diplomatic rift with Saudi Arabia.  https://www.npr.org/2018/08/08/636419495/amid-spat-with-saudis-trudeau-vows-that-canada-will-always-speak-strongly?utm_source=twitter.com&utm_medium=social&utm_campaign=npr&utm_term=nprnews&utm_content=20180809

What Russia did in the 2016 election wasn’t simply meddling. It was a deliberate act of cyber warfare.

Let’s speak truth — the Russian attacks continue to this day and we must fortify our election systems. 
https://twitter.com/Slate/status/1027208555798122496 QT @Slate Why do we keep talking about election “meddling” like we’re living in a Hardy Boys novel? https://slate.com/technology/2018/08/meddling-is-the-worst-word-to-use-to-describe-russias-election-interference.html http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DkFgvLKXgAE2Jdi.jpg

Had a terrific time in Pearland on Tuesday. Thanks to everyone who joined us: https://www.facebook.com/pg/tedcruzpage/photos/?tab=album&album_id=10156438043377464 #TXSen #CruzCrew #KeepTexasRed http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DkLlvwqW0AErVjF.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DkLlxNPW0AE0SFt.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DkLlzcZWsAEDiU6.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DkLl1FJW4AAebiq.jpg

After I asked @CommerceGov about their decision to grant tariff exemptions worth millions to a sanctioned Russian company, they suddenly reversed it. Begging the question – is @realDonaldTrump trying to help the US aluminum industry, or his pal Putin? https://www.warren.senate.gov/imo/media/doc/2018.08.07%20Letter%20to%20Commerce%20Secretary%20on%20Rusal%20America%20Tariff%20Exemptions.pdf

Dyess AFB & Abilene are no exception. Their steadfast dedication & resolve is a pillar in America’s strength, strategic capabilities & deterrence. Honored to visit these brave men & women and I’ll continue working to ensure Texas leads America’s defense.—> https://www.cruz.senate.gov/?p=press_release&id=4024

It's never been more clear who the Trump Administration is really working for.

By backing the Saudi coalition’s war in Yemen with weapons, aerial refueling, and targeting assistance, the United States is complicit in this atrocity. No one can seriously claim that our support for this war is actually making us safer. https://twitter.com/nytimes/status/1027585342029918213 QT @nytimes A bus carrying children on a field trip in Yemen was hit by an airstrike the Saudi-led coalition describes as a "legitimate military operation." At least 29 of the children were killed. https://trib.al/IQ988lH

RT @NJSenatePres Honored to have US Sen. @CoryBooker with us at the Salem County Fair today. Senator Booker is a true friend to Salem County and all of South Jersey. #SalemCountyFair http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DkHqVLUUUAEdnvn.jpg

RT @Hicks_JustinM “It’s a fairly stunning thing that most people don’t know,” @tedcruz / @SenTedCruz said tonight. “That an enterprise as big as the pentagon doesn’t have an audit.” He followed that statement by saying he is working to change that. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DkIGB5PUwAAkSfe.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DkIGB5jU4AEY2rl.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DkIGB5OU0AAego6.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DkIGB5NVAAMNtFU.jpg

Congratulations to @CBP Carla Provost. I look forward to working with you to secure our borders. #HonorFirst https://twitter.com/USBPChief/status/1027559486771396608 QT @USBPChief I am both humble and proud to accept the position of Chief of the #BorderPatrol. I want to thank @SecNielsen and @CBP_McAleenan for their faith and confidence in me. I look forward to serving the agents who protect this nation with steadfast dedication and heart. #HonorFirst

Earlier this year, I was gratified the @usairforce nominated Dyess as an official candidate to host the B-21 bomber. The military communities across the Lone Star State are dedicated to the national security and defense of our great country.

Frankly, every single one of the 100 senators should want to see Kavanaugh’s full record. It’s not just about our duty to vet the nominee, it’s also about transparency for the American people. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DkLP4_MXcAEMW3c.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1027605366102810624/vid/320x180/W9YX06sZ8e8OkSll.mp4?tag=8

I asked the Trump Admin why. https://www.nytimes.com/2018/08/09/us/politics/rusal-tariff-exemption.html

When I first ran for Congress, like many women, I was hesitant to talk about myself and my achievements. But with time, I became more at ease because I believed deeply in everything I said about the issues. 

Never lose faith. Keep fighting for a better tomorrow. —NP
